home.title: Welcome to BOCHUAN
home.description: BOCHUAN INTELLIGENT TECHNOLOGY COMPANY LIMITED specializes in providing smart technology solutions and advanced packaging equipment. We are committed to delivering quality and reliability to our customers.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: Bochuan Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd specializes in providing intelligent technology solutions and advanced packaging equipment. With a strong commitment to quality and credibility, we accompany businesses on their journey toward automation and modernization.
services: Trading and maintenance of packaging machines, vibratory plates, industrial robots
Supplying equipment: PLCs, inverters, servers, frequency converters
Industrial electrical devices and integrated solutions
about.commitment: We always strive to bring customers the most optimal solutions, improving efficiency and accuracy in production processes.
